name: Right-Wing Authoritarianism Scale (Short Form)
description: A 12-item short form of the Right-Wing Authoritarianism Scale measuring authoritarian submission, authoritarian aggression, and conventionalism.
reference: Altemeyer, B. (1996). The Authoritarian Specter. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press.
instructions: Please indicate how much you agree or disagree with each statement.

questions.name: rwas_1
questions.description: Our country desperately needs a mighty leader who will do what has to be done to destroy the radical new ways and sinfulness that are ruining us.

questions.name: rwas_2
questions.description: Gays and lesbians are just as healthy and moral as anybody else.

questions.name: rwas_3
questions.description: It is always better to trust the judgment of the proper authorities in government and religion than to listen to the noisy rabble-rousers in our society.

questions.name: rwas_4
questions.description: Atheists and others who have rebelled against established religions are no doubt every bit as good and virtuous as those who attend church regularly.

questions.name: rwas_5
questions.description: The only way our country can get through the crisis ahead is to get back to our traditional values, put some tough leaders in power, and silence the troublemakers.

questions.name: rwas_6
questions.description: There is absolutely nothing wrong with nudist camps.

questions.name: rwas_7
questions.description: Our country will be destroyed someday if we do not smash the perversions eating away at our moral fiber and traditional beliefs.

questions.name: rwas_8
questions.description: Everyone should have their own lifestyle, religious beliefs, and sexual preferences, even if it makes them different from everyone else.

questions.name: rwas_9
questions.description: The 'old-fashioned ways' and 'old-fashioned values' still show the best way to live.

questions.name: rwas_10
questions.description: You have to admire those who challenged the law and the majority's view by protesting for civil rights.

questions.name: rwas_11
questions.description: What our country really needs is a strong, determined leader who will crush evil, and take us back to our true path.

questions.name: rwas_12
questions.description: Some of the best people in our country are those who are challenging our government, criticizing religion, and ignoring the 'normal way things are supposed to be done.'
